ModMetaData.name: Rimworld Renderer
ModMetaData.author: Epicguru (James B)
ModMetaData.description:
Creates a video file from all the images created by the Progress Renderer mod (or even just screenshots)! You want a timelapse? You got one
[IMPORTANT] This only works on Windows x64! Don't try to run this on Mac/Linux, it won't work!
This is a WIP mod. The interface is not very pretty, and I will update it when I get time. For help and more info on the mod, find it on Github and read the instructions.
